directions: Prepare pudding with milk according to package directions.  In a trifle bowl or other glass serving dish, layer half the cake pieces, half the pudding, half the bananas, half the strawberries and half the whipped topping.  Repeat layers.  Cover and chill in refrigerator 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (9 inch) angel food cake, cut in cubes
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Strawberry Trifle
